rules_text:
Whenever Fangs of Wesgoth deals combat damage to a player, create a Weapon token. [i](It's an Equipment artifact with “Equipped creature gets +1/+1” and equip {2}.)[/i]
As long as you control three or more artifacts, Fangs of Wesgoth has menace.
flavor_text: [i]She exacts vengeance on those that turned her against her will.[/i]
